With a Motu Patlu characters skating on a busy road where you can find the path for survival to be very challenging and demanding a quick response. Here you have to escape him while running cars, trains, and different other hurdles. This skating game has a beautiful environment across the path and ultimate game play. You can also collect coins to unlock different Skate and other items of more importance in-game.

name: Cards and Dungeons
description: Cards and Dungeons is an action-packed roguelike dungeon crawler blending hack-and-slash gameplay with cards. Fight through procedurally generated floors teeming with monsters, gather loot, and unleash powerful effects with collectible cards. Will you survive the depths?

name: Goodbye Monster
description: A monster is hungry. It's up to you to say goodbye. goodbye.monster is a game about saying goodbye, and grief, and transience, created by NYU's Game Lab.

name: Phantasm
description: Horizontal Shooter set in space. Choose from three different classes of ship with different play styles. Includes Visual Novel story progression after each stage.

name: Shark Tale: Fish Eat Fish
description: Sin descripción

name: Imprimatura
description:
Imagine that you are an artist. Imagine that you are in mourning. A painter – your relative, and your former mentor – has died. In their will, they have left you seven paintings of your choosing from their collection. But which seven? What matters to you as both an artist and an inheritor of your mentor’s legacy? And what memories will these paintings stir up?
Imprimatura is a nonlinear work of interactive fiction that makes light use of procedural generation and heavy use of a multilayered painting that changes based on your choices.

name: Bee Movie: Pollenation Practice
description: Sin descripción

name: Bee Movie: That's Un-bee-lievable
description: Sin descripción

name: Do Not Press The Button (To Delete The Multiverse)
description: In this game, you can do anything except press the BIG RED BUTTON. Enjoy various activities and find creative ways to not press the button. Don't press the button! Do you understand? Inspired by games like The Stanley Parable and Title_Pending.

name: Mixpirit
description:
One rainy night, he wakes up from shortness of breath and finds a corpse laying flat. He is confused by his blood-stained body, a place he does not recognize, and the sight, when two men appear.
The two men call themselves "Karamora" and ask for his protection.
He is forced to accept.

name: Sly 2: Band of Thieves
description: Join Sly and crew in a daring heist to outsmart villains worldwide. Experience Sly 2: Band of Thieves originally released on the PlayStation 2 console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Cryptogamous Flowers
description:
An immortality experiment gone horribly wrong at a plant factory. A husband and a wife that could never be separated.
Cryptogamous organisms -- the black spore disease -- and the female researcher that never thought she'd be pregnant.
Maria, the purity in a world devoid of it. An aberration.

Those three stories will intersect.

name: Needy Streamer Overload: Typing of The Net
description: "Needy Streamer Overload: Typing of The Net" is a typing game in which you enter internet lingo in a call-and-response format with a girl (OMGkawaiiAngel) who has a strong need for approval.

name: Akanemachi Kitan
description: In modern-day Tokyo, there is a town called "Akanegai" where humans and demons coexist. Will this alliance last?

name: The Passive Voice
description: The Passive Voice is a short, interactive visual poem and a video game that explores the struggle of my own lived experience with dyslexia and dyspraxia. The main player character is a bouncing eyeball. It acts as a clumsy and voiceless avatar that progresses through and around an ancient woodland representing a dark night of the soul, reminiscing, though stylised cutscenes, about difficult past traumas and the often-overlooked difficulties that neurodivergent people face daily.

name: One Way Ticket
description:
I was heading for a new life and my train brought me here. Nice town: friendly people, corn cuisine, mysterious architecture...

So why am I sure that I need to get out of here as fast as possible?

name: The Mystery Mist
description: In this world, deadly toxic mist is everywhere. The protagonist, Yaqing, becomes an apprentice to a physician skilled in using insects to save his sister, who has been poisoned by the mist. As the story progresses, he finds himself entangled in a tense racial conflict…

name: Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves
description: Dive into a world of cunning heists and honor among thieves. Experience Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves originally released on the PlayStation 2 console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Ultima Founding
description: The Primaris are ready to step in the battle for the God Emperor and the Holy Throne. Eight new units and unique gameplay mechanics will give you more options for the fight for Gladius Prime.

name: RuneQuest: Warlords
description: RuneQuest: Warlords is a battle-scale turn-based strategy game set in the Runequest universe. Immerse yourself in the rich lore of Glorantha. Become a warlord, master the use of runes and defend your tribe against the incursions of Chaos. Field an army drawing from heroes and creatures.

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Flaming Sunrise Campaign by Sandman Simulations
description: It is June 2005. Situation at Persian Gulf has been stable for some years. For the last month there has been rising tension from new direction while Iran has launched multiple naval and air force exercises at southern coast of the country. Iran has made political and diplomatic provocations against other Gulf States, mostly United Arab Emirates, accusing them about production of nuclear and chemical weapons and repeated attacks against Iran commercial shipping. Maybe most worrying was statement of Iran defense minister speaking in Iran television last week telling United Arab Emirates being governed by national socialist leaders threatening security of Iran citizens living in Emirates.

name: Prescription: Love
description:
"You wake up in a hospital with no memory of how you got there. A kind and attentive doctor assures you that you will be under his care, patiently nursing you back to health. No one seems to know what caused your condition. "

Will you recover your lost memories...? Or has he made sure you never will?

name: Lost Footage: Sound In The Silence
description: Sound in the Silence is a horror game where you must find and destroy 10 Totems in a quiet, ominous environment. With each Totem destroyed, more monsters appear and eerie sounds increase, raising the tension. Survive the growing fear and complete your mission before it's too late.

name: The Burton Equation
description: Time is an equation, and you're here to solve it. 1920s Chicago detective Zachary Burton must defeat the Combine's attempts to influence humanity's past in the 20s, 40s, and 80s, and then achieve victory in the present - all the while pursued by a dark mirror of himself.

name: Devil Slayer: Raksasi 2
description: "Devil Slayer - Raksasi 2" is a top-down, action, role-playing game. The game offers four major professions with over a dozen growth directions, more than one hundred weapons, and a rich array of special abilities. Countless powerful enemies lie ahead, and the shattered world needs you to repair it.

name: Dragon Ball Super Divers
description: Dragon Ball Super Divers is a Japanese arcade game developed by Dimps as the seventh Dragon Ball Z: Data Carddass game.

name: Cookie Run India
description:
Enjoy a colorful running game—invite friends to play, laugh, and relax together!

Welcome to CookieRun India, the ultimate running game that combines fast-paced action, colorful graphics, and endless fun! In this exciting runner game, you’ll guide your Cookie characters through thrilling races, all while competing against friends and players from around the world. Are you ready to experience one of the most exciting running games on the market?

With smooth gameplay, no ads, and plenty of rewards and giveaways, CookieRun India brings a new level of excitement to the world of runner games. Get ready to immerse yourself in a game running experience like no other!

name: Capy Castaway
description: Embark on a whimsical adventure with a capybara pup and a clever crow as they set off to find their way home! Sniff, dig, and explore a vibrant world brimming with wonder, challenges, and heartwarming friendships at every turn

name: Piece by Piece
description: It's time to open shop! Inherit your family's repair shop, and roll up your sleeves. Fix up the prized possessions of the forest folk, paint yourself a masterpiece to sell and make your family shop all your own with decorations, furniture and cookies!

name: Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping
description: When spookiness strikes a luxury campsite, the one and only Duck Detective is summoned to quack the case. Inspect evidence, make de-duck-tions, and solve this no-murder mystery!

name: Little Rocket Lab
description: Transform your childhood home as you build brilliant factories and forge lifelong friendships, then reach for the skies and finally finish your family's dream - your mother's precious rocket ship. Roll up your sleeves, it turns out that saving this town really IS rocket science!

name: Locomoto
description: Locomoto is a cozy, life-sim adventure game set on a train, where you are the conductor! Customise and manage your train, while tending to your colourful passengers. Get onboard and embark on a journey through beautiful landscapes, accompanied by a soft, lofi original soundtrack.

name: A Waddleful Life
description: A sweet little game where you play as a duck and raise ducklings.

name: Pinbleton Park
description: Pinbleton Park is a small open world cosy adventure game where the whole world can transform into a giant pinball table. Help the villagers, rescue lost spirits, craft new pinball elements, and take down the corporation bent on destroying the forest!

name: DLC Quest: Live Freemium or Die
description: Sin descripción

name: Wylde Society
description: Step into the elegant heels of Vivian Wylde, witch, socialite and host, in period drama sim Wylde Society! Build, run and customise your magical boarding house in turn of the century Fairhaven. Host splendid events, expand your witchcraft, and influence the town. Who will you invite for tea?

name: Toem 2
description: Step back into the shoes of a curious photographer and set off on a brand new adventure all about uncovering hidden details, helping friends along the way, and documenting the world’s little wonders in TOEM 2, the sequel to the acclaimed TOEM.

name: Hoshi no OkaGakuen Monogatari: Gakuensai
description: Kazuya Murata, the main character, is transferred to a new school, in which he has to help organize the school festival that is one month away. In the meantime, he will also get along with the other students, as they all make sure to make the school festival a fun experience.

name: Rocket League: Season 17
description:
High-score chasing and racing await as we press play on Rocket League Season 17. Prepare to level up your Soccar skills as this neo-arcade-inspired season kicks off on December 4!
⁠
In Season 17, try out the Online Free Play feature, battle for supremacy in the Neo Tokyo (Arcade) Arena, master the new Split Shot game mode, and look forward to leveling up a new Rocket Pass!

name: Omega 6 The Triangle Stars
description: OMEGA 6 The Triangle Stars is an adventure game with 16-bit styling, based on the manga by former Nintendo art director, Takaya Imamura.

name: The Dark Queen of Mortholme
description:
You are the Dark Queen—the most powerful being of your entire universe. Your lair is breached by an aspiring hero—a pitiful thing, easily crushed.

Except they keep coming back.

A 20 minute anti-game about an unconventional relationship and the capacity for change.

name: MegaMan Power Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Shippin
description: Embark on a journey across cozy islands, where you’ll fish and experience magical moments. Uncover the stories of an ocean, where each harbor is a welcoming place, with friendly characters waiting to help guide you back home!

name: MineGeon: Renegades
description: Descend into Planet Paimo in MineGeon: Renegades, a chaotic multiplayer roguelite where you choose your renegade, delve into the minegeons, and battle unique enemies across diverse biomes. Fight, gather, improve, and die to uncover the secrets of Paimo and New Olympia.

name: Sin Squad: Stealth Assassins
description: Master 7 deadly assassins with unique abilities in the twisted world of Sin Squad: Stealth Assassins, a 3rd Person Stealth Assassination game. Use the environment and dozens of stealth tools to infiltrate a doomed city and set it free from the inside.

name: Dark Dawn: The Chronicles of a Doll
description: Sin descripción

name: AM Archaic Memories
description: It's a 3D platform about the dreams and nightmares of a 90-year-old being.

name: Kraino Rebirth
description: Sin descripción

name: L.I.A.C.F.F Tale of the Cursed Chain
description: Sin descripción

name: Cosmorons
description: A mix of gravity-defying gameplay, slapstick-tinged parody, and a classic low-poly-inspired aesthetic all wrapped up in an addictive arcade shooter for 1-4 players!

name: Project Mustard
description: Sin descripción

name: Don't Kill Rumble
description: Sin descripción

name: Knock Off: The Battle for Imagination
description: Sin descripción

name: Kentum
description: Stranded in the year 10,000, Kent—an average Joe turned clone—must survive, explore, and rebuild civilization with the help of a snarky AI. Craft, farm, and automate in this 2D craftervania adventure as you uncover Earth’s secrets and kickstart humanity, one machine at a time.

name: Take Us North
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Hunters
description: Join space bounty hunters in a brutal 2D handmade beat 'em up, where every punch and kick is fueled by action and greed. Battle your way through a gritty, money-driven universe in this intense, fast-paced adventure.

name: AstroBrawl
description: AstroBrawl is a fast-paced interplanetary shooter in which gravity is your best ally and your worst enemy. Be an alien warrior through couch/online deathmatch and survival modes.

name: Go Slimey Go!
description: Go Slimey Go! is an easy-to-pick-up game for players of all ages! Help Slimey, our tiny slippery protagonist, visit his friends for some well deserved teatime after some thrilling platforming challenges! Just make sure not to get caught in the middle of the ultimate showdown between good and evil!

name: Curse of the Dragonbeast
description: A team-turn-based MOBA centralized around slaying monsters, gathering items, gaining levels, and competing in teams of five to slay an enemy teams dragon. CotDb takes place in a grimdark alternative future where dragons have returned to Earth, use their blood to grant magical powers to humans, and uses the same dragons blood to control their minds. Humans are used as soldiers in their war against other dragons, as they seek to collect magical artifacts to grow their Draconic magic. The player takes on the role of a dragons thrall, venturing into the wilds to fight enemy thralls and retrieve treasure for their master.

name: Jaethoria
description: 2D Pixel Art Old School MMORPG

name: Kenneth Rice: Vampire Detective
description: You play as Kenneth Rice; a 130-year-old hard-boiled detective with sensibilities firmly in the 1920s era from when he was bitten by a vampire. When he gets a call from a mysterious stranger with a missing necklace, Kenneth steps up to the challenge; using his detective skills and vampiric transformation powers to solve the case. (And maybe fall in love?)

name: Remnants of Calandria
description: Remnants of Calandria is a short one-hour-long RPG Maker MV game submission to the 2022 Indie Game Maker Contest: Rebirth. It is a short top-down action-exploration game with a real-time battle system, about prowling through the remains of a destroyed land and the small civilization that's managed to recover from it.

name: 8-Bit Blocks
description: Discover a world of blocky action in 8-Bit Blocks for the Commander X16!

name: Hot Wheels: Race Off+
description: Hot Wheels: Race Off+ is pure adrenaline sure to get your heart racing. Can you master the tracks and build the ultimate car collection?

name: Soccer Bros
description: Fun, fast-paced 1 on 1 soccer game with lots of action! Pick from a variety of characters and let the play begin. Go for crazy shots, make that penalty kick, or maybe even tackle your opponent! The controls are very simple: Use either the arrow keys or wasd to control your bro. Space bar will shoot if you have the ball and tackle if you are on defense. Be sure to allow notifications so you will know when fun new soccer characters are added to the game!

name: Grand Theft Auto: New York
description: Grand Theft Auto: New York is an unofficial Grand Theft Auto game for browsers developed and released by Kiz10. The game follows a set of missions the player has to achieve within the 3D world.

name: Football Bros
description: The latest in our line of Bros games, Football Bros has really taken off and we couldn’t be more proud! We’ve even added a new Franchise mode so you can take your team on the road across America and lead them to victory!

name: A Day of Slacking
description: Sin descripción

name: Dancing Ant
description: You choose the move and he'll do the groove! You control the music, dance moves, lyrics and backing.

name: Bonk The Goblins!
description: Bonk the Goblins! is Whackamole meets microgames! It's full of hectic and funny score attack arcade action.

name: Toy Box
description: A pull-apart puzzle visual novel whose fragments stitch the story together.

name: Toaplan Arcade Collection 4
description: Toaplan Arcade 4 for Evercade brings together 6 more all-action arcade hits from the beloved Japanese developer Toaplan. Blast off for explosive action in the shoot ’em ups Dogyuun and Grind Stormer, enjoy cartoony platform fun in Snow Bros. 2 and Pipi and Bibi’s, and hit the streets in the wrestling-themed beat ’em up Knuckle Bash.

name: Toaplan Arcade Collection 3
description: Toaplan Arcade 3 for Evercade brings together 7 all-time classic arcade hits from the legendary Japanese developer Toaplan. Discover the origins of the “bullet hell” subgenre with Batsugun and its Special Version variant; run and gun with Out Zone and FixEight; take the controls of the HyperFighter in explosive sequel Truxton II; blast your way through enemies and environments inspired by Indian mythology in Vimana; and bust some blocks with Ghox!

name: Data East Arcade 2
description: Data East Arcade 2 brings players 12 more all-action arcade classics from Data East’s extensive back catalogue. Includes the cinematic action of Edward Randy, the prehistoric platforming of Joe & Mac Returns, the offbeat craziness of Trio The Punch: Never Forget Me… and many more!

name: Anomaly Patroller
description: Story: You are being hired to become an anomaly patroller. Your job is to investigate the area that is being haunted by anomalous activity through the special protocol. If there's an anomaly, press the button then proceed. If there's no anomaly, proceed without pressing the button. You must make it to area 20 to finish the protocol. Good luck.

name: Real Bird Fake Bird
description:
Sort the real birds from the fake birds,
with new topics daily.

name: The Bitmap Brothers Collection 2
description: The Bitmap Brothers Collection 2 for Evercade brings together five home computer classics from the self-appointed “rock stars” of the British game development scene, including Cadaver and its expansion The Payoff, Gods, Magic Pockets and The Chaos Engine 2, plus the 32-bit home console version of real-time strategy classic Z!

name: Metal Dragon
description: The President's daughter has been kidnapped, and Metal Dragon is the only one who can save her in this 16-bit run and gun action game. The powers that be want this to be a stealthy mission, but Metal Dragon has other ideas… and easy access to lots of guns.

name: Metal Dragon/Life on Mars
description: Kai Magazine Software brings two action-packed 16-bit titles to Evercade. Battle to prevent World War III in Metal Dragon, and solve the mystery of a seemingly abandoned space colony in Life on Mars!

name: Gemwielders
description: In this competitive deckbuilding game you are a Gemwielder, capable of controlling an ancient artifact weapon. Socket mystical gems to acquire powerful abilities and prevail in a duel against another Gemwielder.

name: Pleasuredrome
description: Short erotic visual novel made for the DOMINO CLUB BODIES IN MOTION JAM.

name: Pub Mania
description: Be quick on your feet as you serve customers in your own pub and open new pubs all around the UK! During happy hour, you alone will seat the customers, take their orders, and serve them. Pay attention to their preferences and react to their moods, because in Pub Mania, the customer is king! You can improve the place or improve the service. It’s up to you to turn it into the hottest spot in the city and make your dream a reality!

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Inherent Resolve Campaign by Looking Glass
description: Welcome to Inherent Resolve - an exciting and immersive player friendly campaign for the F/A-18C Hornet in Syria.

name: DCS World: AV-8B Kerman Campaign by Ground Pounder Sims
description: Join ‘Detachment B’ of US Marine Corps Harrier squadron VMA-311 as they embark on ‘The Kerman Campaign’. The 2011 Arab Spring has driven civil unrest across the middle east and in Iran has resulted in the violent repression of it’s citizens, this chain of events has led to the formation of a US led coalition and the launch of Operation Persian Freedom. The Kerman Campaign puts you in the shoes of USMC Captain Mitch ‘Mike-Mike’ Mickleson as the Harrier pilots of ‘Det B’ fight to protect their fellow marines on the ground.

name: Tile Tales: Pirate
description: Solve logic puzzles while following the journey of a mischievous pirate as he plunders his way across a mysterious secluded island in search of the ultimate treasure!

name: DCS World: Mosquito FB VI - V for Victory Campaign by Reflected Simulations
description: Some of the thrilling sorties flown by Mosquito units in World War II belong to movie screens rather than history books. The ’wooden wonder’ flew in an astonishing variety of roles, and some of them were truly stranger than fiction. ’V for Victory’ will take you through most of these different sorties: Night intruder, ranger, oboe pathfinder, noball, photo recce, Joan Eleanor - just to mention a few.

name: Sunset Irreligion
description: A spiritual successor to their previous WAD Fallen Leaves

name: DCS World: F-14 Speed & Angels Campaign by Reflected Simulations
description: Some dreams are worth fighting for. “Speed and Angels, the Campaign” is a joint production between Reflected Simulations, and Commander Paco Chierici. Paco is a former Tomcat fighter pilot and F-5 bandit. He is the creator and producer of the film Speed and Angels and the novel Lions of the Sky. Together Paco and Reflected have joined forces to bring you a truly epic DCS campaign combining next level realism and immersion. You will live the campaign. Strap in.

name: Wooly Rockbottom and the Quest for the Golden Beard of Thor!
description: Sin descripción

name: Engie Benjy: Time for Teamwork!
description: Sin descripción

name: Teletubbies: Jigsaw
description: Generic game included on various Teletubbies DVDs

name: Teletubbies: Oooh! - Tinky Winky's Bag of Fun
description: Sin descripción

name: Teletubbies: Look! - Hide and Seek
description: Sin descripción

name: Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy
description: A port of Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Birdcage (Oda al Pájaro)
description: Sin descripción

name: New Year's Jam
description: Sin descripción

name: Fool's Pub
description:
Welcome to Fool’s Pub - The Online Multiplayer Card Game.

This isn’t just a card game – it’s an online multiplayer battle where up to four players compete in a high-stakes game of skill, luck, and survival. Outplay your friends or strangers from around the world and prove you’ve got what it takes to be the last one standing.

- First-Person Fun: Experience the game through the eyes of your character, bringing you closer to the action with every draw, bluff, and shot fired.
- Play Your Way: Jump online to challenge others or enjoy offline mode with clever AI opponents when you’re flying solo.
- Cute and Dangerous: Meet adorable characters packing serious heat – their charm hides a fierce determination to win at any cost.
- Rough Rules, Wild Rounds: With Russian roulette-style mechanics, every turn could spell glory or disaster. Will you take the risk or play it safe?
- Only One Wins: In this pub, there’s no second place. Outwit, outplay, and outlast everyone else to claim the ultimate victory.

Get ready for the perfect mix of strategy, adrenaline, and chaos.
Fool’s Pub is calling – are you brave enough to answer?

name: Christmas Bazaar: Manager Simulator
description: Christmas Bazaar - Manager Simulator is a relaxed first-person simulation game where every aspect of running a Christmas Bazaar comes to life.

name: World Explorer Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Housekeeping to Room 501
description: A work simulator set in an old hotel that is definitely not haunted. Clean the rooms and make sure our guests feel at home!

name: Beluflin: Beautiful Luminous Flying Insects
description:
In the small forest of Flin Woods there was a huge village of fireflies. They lit up the entire forest, and enchanted all the other animals.

Unfortunately, at some point recently, humans began to expand their city closer to this forest. As a result, the light of the fireflies was completely overshadowed by the brightness of the artificial lights. And then the firefly population began to decline rapidly.

name: Untravelled Planet
description: Outer space 3D-platformer action.

name: Holy Shot
description: Holy Shot is a fast-paced, physics-based top-down shooter. Face nasty hordes of monsters in a chaotic environmental destruction, combining powerful weapons and strategic abilities to survive intense battles against challenging bosses.

name: The Cabin Factory
description: Your job at the Cabin Factory is simple: inspect the cabins and decide on whether they’re haunted or not. If you do find any anomalies, get out…immediately.

name: Faraway
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultimate Sheep Raccoon
description: Ultimate Sheep Raccoon is a bike-racing party game where you and your friends build the course together. Add obstacles and dangerous traps, take the lead with power-ups, and race to the finish!

name: Recur
description: A time-bending journey to the end of the world and back. Run, jump, and manipulate time to solve puzzles as the apocalypse unfolds. Can you stop the clock on disaster?

name: Myself;Yourself: Sorezore no Finale
description: The game features four new scenarios with Nanaka and Asami getting separate scenarios, and there are two duel scenarios with Syuri and Aoi in one, and Hinako and Yuzuki in the other. Several new characters are also introduced.

name: Neon Abyss 2
description: Plunge into the chaotic cybermyth roguelike world of Neon Abyss 2! With diverse combat styles and unlimited item synergies, every run delivers a dramatic and action-packed experience you won't forget.

name: PBJ: The Musical
description:
Imagine Romeo and Juliet… but it’s Peanut Butter and Jelly? This handcrafted musical game tells the badly researched story of the iconic sandwich’s tragic origins.
Join peanut boy and strawberry girl on their journey across animated paper landscapes, to the music from famous Crumble Lady Lorraine Bowen – and unlock spinoff remixes from different artists!

name: Fortnite Ballistic
description:
FORTNITE BALLISTIC is a first-person, 5v5 tactical FPS in Early Access. Prove your talents, precision and teamwork to overcome your opponents.

Each round, use your skills and gadgets to Attack and Defend your side. Avoid elimination and outplay your opponents to secure victory for your team.

TACTICAL CHOICES MATTER.
Choose your gadget and lock in! Fortnite Ballistic provides unique, Flex gadgets that can alter the outcome of a round. Once you’ve locked in your gadget, add it to your arsenal during the Buy phase of each round and go ballistic.

FIRST PERSON, FULL IMPACT
Fortnite Ballistic is the first Fortnite mode built using the First Person Camera Mode Device in UEFN. Experience Fortnite in an all new way, challenging your skills and testing your tactics.

Getting this experience is not necessary to access this content. When you launch Fortnite using this through your Library, the experience will be pre-selected for your convenience.

name: Feltopia
description: In this hand-felted, stop-motion "cute-em-up," the realms of Feltopia have been infected by a mysterious Smog Spirit. Skyrider flies on their pegasus through wondrous landscapes to save their magical sheep, transform creatures, and battle bosses on their quest to uncover Feltopia’s secrets.

name: Blippo+
description: Never bland and non-demand. You simply can’t find television like this anywhere else. Change the way you channel with Blippo+. Coming soon.

name: Rengoku
description:
Rengoku is a mobile phone version of Rengoku: The Tower of Purgatory.

A new rengoku game made it for java phone devices. The game, compared with the PlayStation Portable releases, was simplified for those devices. Instead of a third-person view, it has an isometric view. The player only has 5 weapons available, including the melee attack, and there can be collected in the stages. The upgrade system only consist in a.d.a.m's parts that can be upgraded by points, which can be collected by killing enemies.

name: Flaregate Network
description: Flaregate Network is a roguelike deckbuilder with RTS-inspired spaceship combat. Build a unique deck, then pilot it—and your fleet—to victory!

name: The Old Barn
description: The Old Barn is a short, 10-minute narrative experience in the walking simulator genre. Explore a cosy, messy, and warm old barn and listen to the musings of the narrator as she recalls growing up in this environment. Relax while you navigate this highly detailed environment, listening to the soothing voice inviting to calm reflection and pondering of life's learnings and mysteries. Take your time and see if you can spot any secret objects hiding in the clutter -- examining them from up close might reward you with a display of light. Can you spot all seven of them?

name: Dreaming Seal Simulator
description: Dreaming Seal Simulator is a retro-style arcade game where you play as a seal of dreams and you have to calm down each kid that has a bad dream until the in-game time of 6AM - every 500 points can advance you towards that time.

name: Chumini: Tiny Army
description: In this vampire survivor-like, summon an army of tiny Chuminis to battle waves of forest demons. Each Chumini has its own movement patterns: it's up to you to manage this merry mess to create an unstoppable force!

name: The Box
description: You just started your new job at which you have to break boxes. What could possibly go wrong.

name: Home Sports
description:
Get ready to play, laugh, and move like never before! Step into a mixed-reality world with five dynamic sports that everyone can enjoy. Whether you’re hosting a friendly match or showing off your skills, Home Sports brings the action to life —all designed for social fun.

Pickleball - Our simplified rules make the game more intuitive than ever! Swing your paddle and try to outsmart your opponent without hitting the net.
Hockey - Experience what feels like a mix between ice hockey and air hockey with this original twist! Bounce the puck off the sides or go straight for the goal.
Bowling - It’s not how you bowl, it’s how you roll! Will you be able to make a perfect 300? Or will you become a gutterball guru?
⛳Mini Golf - Try to get as many hole-in-ones and birdies as possible in three different beautiful courses: classic, modern and nature.
Badminton - Play the fastest racket sport in the world for the first time in mixed reality!

Invite up to three friends to join you, locally or online, and compete in thrilling multiplayer action. Every sport adapts to your personal play space, making it easy to jump straight into the action. Whether you’re aiming for a hole-in-one in mini golf or defending the net in hockey, Home Sports is packed with endless entertainment, laughter, and competition.

Want to become the best of class? The game also features solo matches, drills and a career mode.

Experience your favorite sports like never before. Play today!

name: Mtion studio
description: Create, play, and remix immersive 3D experiences with mtion—where you can bring immersive stories to life without coding. Build interactive worlds, publish with ease, and connect with a vibrant community across platforms like Twitch and YouTube.

name: Murder Gods Play Pachinko
description:
A group of friends gathers in a remote house for the first time in two years.

This is the place where Kaya took his life. Tensions are high, to say the least.

The snowstorm isn't letting up. It appears they're trapped. The only company they have is each other.

Little do they know -- time isn't on their side.

He's on his way.

name: Kaiju Control Force
description: Lead a team of survivors into the abandoned Kaiju Control Force facilities, where bioengineered rats escaped and research went awry long ago, in this one-screen arcade platformer. Jump, climb and buy items from vending machines to reach the Mecha Kaiju Maintenance Bay and reclaim our city!

name: A Bone To Pick
description: Ribsy is a skeleton, brought to life by the capricious Skeleton God. The Skeleton God is bored, and so he's set Ribsy a task- figure out who killed the pirate Captain who once owned Ribsy's bones.

name: A Single Fallen Feather
description:
"The Shadow Over the Sky, Cielvide, had been utterly defeated. But the shadows have started to grow ever deeper of late..."

A Single Fallen Feather is a turn-based RPG where the player creates a party of four out of 12 selectable classes.

name: Yeeraffe
description: A very normal giraffe game. It's just hungry.

name: Evoscape
description: Action Roguelike where you build your organism by dividing and placing cells. Pick from random mutations and specialize your cells in one of 11 genes. Test your organism in a fast paced melee- and ranged combat with timing-based parry system against enemies and bosses.

name: Fraction Munchers
description: Fraction Munchers is the second math based game in the Munchers series of educational games. Aside from the subject matter, the basic concept is the same as other games in the series. It is played on a grid where the player controls a creature called the Fraction Muncher who has to eat the numbers or fractional expressions that correspond to the statement that is written above the grid. Other creatures known as troggles roam the grid and try to get to the muncher. There are five different ones and they all have their own behaviour and movement patterns. Eating wrong answers or getting caught by a troggle leads to a life being lost. There are four different game modes which decide what kind of statements should appear: fraction types, equivalents, comparing and expression. Additionally there is a combined mode that mixes all.

name: Class of Heroes 3: Remaster
description: The classic, school-based 3D dungeon-crawling RPG is back! After a 15-year wait, the third installment in the series comes to the West, with new features, more characters, classes, and bigger dungeons.

name: Moldbreaker: Rise of the Loaf
description: 'Moldbreaker: Rise of the Loaf' is a quirky 3D roguelite-action game where you play as Bradley the Breadapus, a waffle-tailed bread platypus, battling moldy monstrosities to save the Bread Kingdom! Dodge, slap, and upgrade yourself to restore freshness and fight the rise of the mold!

name: Spirit of the Obelisk
description: Switch between four unique heroes, each with their own special ability in this charming puzzle platformer. Play alone or with a friend to complete interesting puzzles in vibrant themed worlds.

name: Crony Corp
description: Master Crony — it’s up to you to buy, craft, strategize, manufacture, and hijack to outperform your rivals and build your empire. In this competitive business builder game, your choices shape the live market. Seize every opportunity to dominate…or get demoted!

name: Version -1: Where Love Lies
description:
A prequel side story to Pokémon Rejuvenation, Where Love Lies tells the story of Keta and Taelia, presented in a short package of four chapters with two endings. It contains most of Rejuvenation's mechanics, based on Generation VII.

Where Love Lies eschews the traditional Pokémon formula, with no Pokédex, Gym battles or Pokémon catching. Instead, adding Pokémon to your party must be done through story progression or by finding them in secret locations.

name: Dawn of Kagura: Keika's Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Dawn of Kagura: Hatsuka's Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Tower Survivor
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse in this top-down, tower-defense game with survivor-like elements. Customize your magic tower with talents and upgrades to defend it against zombie waves. Can you keep your tower alive?

name: Nakobeat
description: A pixel art rhythm game where you control the main character, "Nako-chan", and avoid enemy characters approaching in rhythm. In a pinch, strum the guitar to wipe out the enemies!

name: Die for the Economy!
description: Blast evil robots in a retro psychedelic maze of an office, as you bring down the security servers and make your way home. Die for the Economy! is a retro arcade survival game featuring beautiful, chunky pixel art graphics with a psychedelic slant harking back to the old 8-bit game systems.

name: Space Menace 2
description: Start small, expand your fleet, rise to power, and eventually command entire factions in this seamless blend of sci-fi space RTS and battle game. With strategic gameplay and evolving challenges, every decision shapes your legacy in the stars.

name: Elemental
description: A cute and cozy puzzle game themed around the elements. Despite the easy-going art style, the game's puzzles can be quite challenging. Make your way through eleMENTAL by merging elements, discovering new interactions, and solving mind-bending puzzles.

name: Digseum
description: Digseum is a short, unique incremental journey about digging up ancient relics and building the greatest museum ever! Excavate for ancient relics across the world, manage your resources and upgrade your abilities, and build the biggest and greatest museum the world has ever seen!

name: Quondam
description: Sin descripción

name: Pastopia
description: Become a Memory Walker in Pastopia and restore the mystical lands of Talmanu. In this open-world adventure, team up with your Golem A.I companion to explore vast environments, solve puzzles, and unleash your creativity. Discover the lost memories of Pastopia and shape your own adventure!

name: Stolen Realm Survivors
description: Stolen Realm Survivors is an online co-op survivor-like auto-shooter. Battle hordes of fierce enemies, discover ancient artifacts, merge unique skill trees, and unlock powerful upgrades to survive. Wield the full power of the Stolen Realm. Play solo or with friends against relentless minions!

name: Supply Chained
description: An Open World Capitalism RPG where you manage a supply chain and keep anyone from touching it with all means necessary.

name: Crash Presents: July 1989
description: Covertape compilation included with Crash Magazine issue 66. Included were four full ZX Spectrum games, including the original release of 'Quondam', later published by Ocean, and 'A Whole New Ball Game.'

name: Longjuice Squeeze
description: Shoot, parry, and slash your way to self-awareness in Longjuice Squeeze, a roguelite fighting game where you get to steal gear from your opponent when you win. Featuring wild art, sick music, rollback netcode, and highly customizable fighters.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Shared History
description: Shared History is a free update for Assassin's Creed: Valhalla. It follows Eivor Varinsdottir's meeting with Basim Ibn Ishaq's former mentor Roshan to combat common enemies who had joined forces against the two women.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: Those Who Are Treasured
description: This is part 1 of the Assassin's Creed Crossover Stories that had Kassandra travel to the island of Korfu to explore the aftermath of obtaining the immortality-granting Staff of Hermes Trismegistus

name: End's Reach
description: End's Reach is a 3D Exploration Action Adventure Game that focuses on a character lost in the depths of space. Players will solve puzzles, collect upgrades, items, weapons and even magical abilities as they uncover the mysteries of this strange new world. A classic tale of technology taken too far.

name: Flexible Frosty
description: A short and icy GameBoy-style puzzle platformer featuring Frosty, a cute little penguin who can not jump like other penguins.

name: Darkbound
description: Darkbound is a survival horror game where you play as a cat. Avoid the darkness, solve puzzles and help other survivors to escape the hospital.

name: Adventurers Guild Inc.
description: Adventurers Guild Inc. is a tycoon/management game where you build your Guild from the ground up! Hire staff, post quests, and fulfill the needs of independent adventurers (while taking a cut). Manage your budget, grow your reputation, and become the greatest Guild Master of all!

name: Sudden Soul
description: A sudden blackout within the city of Oasys causes havoc as people and creatures wake up with new powers. Control your party in this turn-based RPG with a mix of CCG. Combo different elements together. Light up an enemy who just got oil bombed, shock a ruffian after they get drenched in water.

name: RPG Chess
description: A turn-based RPG, except it's also chess! Instead of capturing, your pieces engage in thrilling 1v1 battles where they can level up and unlock powerful abilities. Shape your team as you progress through the single-player campaign or challenge others in online matches!

name: Wave Defense: Trappist
description: Gear up and get going! Defend your outposts from waves of alien enemies with your mech. Build and upgrade your base, protecting the extraction of the mysterious planetary system’s rich resources!

name: Skatehouse
description: Skatehouse is a small idle game where you manage a skate shop. Manufacture pieces, combine parts, and sell boards.

name: In the Abyss of Dream
description: Two worlds, one nightmare. Explore a gruesome orphanage, solve puzzles related to an inexplicable phenomenon, and dive into the depths of dreams to uncover otherworldly horrors. In the Abyss of Dream is a cosmic horror point-and-click game set during the Great Darkness.

name: Love In Tiny Spaces
description: A bite sized quickie of a game, find your girlfriend and avoid her parents [and neighbours!] in this humorous tongue-in-cheek top-down stealth game! Navigate the corridors of the big city - then change it up using the powers of the Love Transport Authority(LTA), with love as your guide.

name: Bashful Adoration
description: Fight for your love with 2-4 friends locally or online in easy-to-learn, hard-to-master combat. Soar the skies on your broom, and dash and smash props and opponents until they're a twinkling dot on the horizon! Secure powerups, land devastating blows, and win the adoration of your crush!

name: Proud Dad Simulator
description: Have you ever wondered what it feels like to have a proud and supportive dad? Proud Dad Simulator gives you the loving father you wish you had growing up! Simply click dad to receive an affirmation, or delve deeper to explore all 10 minigames and collect all achievements.

name: Bambas!
description: Relive your childhood and turn every crosswalk, curb, and puddle into an epic adventure with this innovative urban walking simulator.

name: The Case of the Worst Day Ever
description:
A family is gathered for a cozy celebration, but everyone looks miserable! What happened here? Who are these people (and pets)?! And why are they so unhappy?!?

Revisit each family member's worst moment, deduce what happened, and cheer everyone up in this cozy fill-in-the-blank mystery!

name: Robo Ride & Glide
description: Ride, Glide, and collect powerups to upgrade your hover car, and gain an advantage against your friends in a random mini game

name: The Holiday Bakeoff
description: Sin descripción

name: Qualia
description: Intellica thanks you for volunteering in this short text-based AMT study. Pay attention to the participants answers, and classify them as either Human or Artificial. Remember, think happy!

name: Upstream
description: Play as a salmon journeying home in this challenging physics based platformer using only two buttons! Remember that on a voyage through innumerable obstacles and constant danger, it is your reaction to adversity that determines your success.

name: Excavation Alliance: Cadoramo
description: A tough side-scrolling action roguelike game. In underground caves where various "animal" factions vie for resources, danger, treasures, and intrigue abound! To be a cave explorer, confronting numerous enemies with daggers, guns, great swords, or attack with magic wands!

name: A Case of Fraud
description: A non-linear detective adventure. Investigate a case of fraud by analysing documents from an abandoned office. Examine evidence, connect clues, and make your own deductions to solve the case.

name: Steel Century Groove
description: Pilot mecha in rhythm-RPG dance battles. Assemble a squad of colossal dancers, challenge every rival you lock eyes with, compete for the championship trophy, and uncover the secrets of a world where everything moves to the drumbeat of steel feet.

name: 1cm Time
description: Explore, adventure, collect, and experience anecdotes and various interesting characters in a city-based 3D RPG, discovering some beautiful little worlds. Or perhaps wander aimlessly on the streets, relaxing in the shade of trees. Such a wonderful time is not far away.

name: StarSim: BattleZone
description: StarSim: BattleZone is a real-time strategy (RTS) game set in the StarSim universe. Take command of an army and lead your faction to victory. Gameplay includes classic RTS mechanics such as: building a base, gathering resources, researching new technologies, building defences, training units, etc.

name: Gladiators of Citadelum
description: The ultimate gladiator management sim. Hire and train fighters in different disciplines, defeat your rivals in the arena, climb through the ranks and, remember, give the best spectacle Rome has ever seen to survive. Blood and glory await!

name: Funko Fusion: Hazel & Cha-Cha Pack
description: Now you too can be a time travelling assassin! This pack adds The Umbrella Academy's Hazel and Cha-Cha as playable characters.

name: Funko Fusion: Wicked Movie Pack 1
description: Pink goes good with Green!

name: Funko Fusion: Wicked Movie Pack 2
description: The Wizard will see you now!

name: Funko Fusion: Wicked Movie DLC Bundle
description: Funko Fusion - Wicked DLC Bundle

name: Fogpiercer
description: Build your train to build your deck. Fight off bandits in a post apocalyptic world. Progress and unlock new train combinations with synergies. Get drivers to their final destinations.

name: Hyperwired
description: Pilot a ship with a charger hanging. Explore an ever-changing space an plug to recharge your energy while surviving the enemy breach in this cable-like space shooter with roguelike elements and plugged resource management.

name: Oni Magatsu Toki
description: A girl wakes up to find the world has been overtaken by God. Being the only human left, Okappa has no choice but to survive in this strange world. Her only companion is a mysterious white fox who strums a guitar.

name: Snakeloop
description: Snakeloop is a challenging puzzle game based on a simple idea: What if you took classic Snake but inverted the goal and made it so you have to form a loop by eating your own tail.

name: Ghostslayers
description: Ghostslayers is a wave-based top-down coop shooter where you slay the ghosts with magic and couple thousands of bullets... Or punches, or slashes, or explosions. Use the varied weaponary, spell cards and abilities, combine them together with your allies for more power and get through the city.

name: A Byte War
description: A Byte War is a real time strategy game where you lead a race of block-based machines against a machine threat from another dimension. Construct buildings from blocks arranged in various patterns and leverage your machines to convert the world around you.

name: Super Platform Tag
description: Tag, chase, and outsmart your friends in this chaotic platformer party game featuring your favorite variations of tag. Snag crazy power-ups, place obstacles to gain a winning edge, and unlock a colorful cast of characters and stages. Enjoy the ignorant bliss of childhood.

name: My Dark Eden
description: Dark Eden is a short visual novel, where, after accepting a job to investigate the remote mountains, you will meet two peculiar semi-humans along with a big old secret.

name: Scourge of the Reptiles
description: Scourge of the Reptiles is a party-based tactical RPG set in a prehistoric fantasy world. When a meteor strikes the Earth, humans, elves and dinosaurs alike are gifted with magical abilities—abilities that result in war, devastation and forces that stretch far beyond the hero’s quiet home village.

name: Yorumorukimiri: Hajimari no Shoujo
description: A cat, adorned with a guitar and a sword. The calls who calls himself a "demon", gazes at the universe. The demon observes a girl swiftly passing through the twinkling stars. The girl, racing through the cosmos, is known as the "Girl of The Beginning". This marks the concluding tale surrounding the mysterious dog and Yorumorukimiri.

name: Blast-A-Finn
description: A 2D physics-based platformer. play as a fish who can only move by blasting arm cannons in a direction and getting launched the opposite way.

name: Towelket One More Time: Kemono
description: The world has already ended. The protagonist, Okappa, wakes up to find her home overrun by killer beasts. She meets Shinshi, a white rabbit who will guide her through this ruined world. Meanwhile the other protagonist, a young Tanuki named Tantanuki begins his new life at PonPon school, a cheerful school that specializes in teaching machinery to beasts.

name: Iron Village
description: With the help of your railway, build houses, farms, warehouses, and more to create your village. Trade what your people make for other resources and gold to grow your village into a prospering town, and grow the railway into a powerhouse.

name: Incrate
description: Incrate is a mind-warping 2D/3D puzzle game within a crate! Bend reality and manipulate your perspective to solve the puzzles and escape!

name: Mafia
description: Sin descripción

name: Elemental Showdown
description: Unleash elemental chaos in this thrilling top-down arena party game! Fight using Fire, Water, and Plant elements, strategically switching between them to gain the upper hand. Navigate elemental shifting zones to outsmart your friends and emerge victorious!

name: Snake in the Dark
description: Sure, you've played Snake. But could you play it blind? Snake in the Dark is a total re-imagination of the timeless arcade and puzzle game classics like Snake and Sokoban. Fun gameplay you know delivered with more puzzling twisssts than you expect!

name: Hopeful Day Inside Room
description: Right after moving to a big city and getting a new apartment, you were fired from your job! And now you don't want to go outside again! Improve your skills, manage your time and find a way to make money without having to leave the room! Watch as your plans go down the drain and you sleep through the whole week!

name: Wanwan Datte Uchuu No Shinpi
description: The great adventures of Space Investigator Pon-kun. While on his mission to search for Area51 on Earth, he comes across a stray dog named Pucchi and turns her into a human girl. Unable to reverse his mistake, he takes her along on his journey.

name: I Come In Peace
description: Don't panic! survive the bullet hell action. As a goofy pacifist alien that crashed on Earth, use your tech abilities to evade paranoid humans whose deadly attacks on you cause destruction and mayhem. Navigate the chaos, collect your spaceship parts, and run the hell out of this crazy planet!

name: South of the Circle: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: About a Boy
description: Sin descripción

name: Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: About a Boy: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pika Game 64
description: Sin descripción

name: This House Eats People
description: THIS HOUSE EATS PEOPLE is a short psx horror game where the player uses a Polaroid camera to take photos of an abandoned farmhouse. The game was created and submitted for the GMTK Game Jam 2024.

name: Finding America: New England - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: How to: Superhero!
description: Sin descripción

name: Memory Holder: Animal Kingdom
description: Sin descripción

name: Mia and Me: Magic Friends
description: Take your unicorn for a ride through enchanting tracks. Discover the Rainbow Island, Crystal Cave, Heart Valley, Blackwood Forest, and many more magical locations. Help Mia, Yuko and Mo protect Centopia - take on exciting quests, search for magical items, and then, with the help of Phuddle, banish Gargona and the other villains! And then there's the cute little ponycorns you're sure to fall in love with too!

name: My Life: Zoo Vet
description: Take care of sick zoo animals!

name: CatCat
description: Take on a journey with a brave cat! In each level of this adventure, spikes and traps demand insane precision to be overcome. You only have one chance, so if you fail, start over.

name: Warplanes: WW1 + WW2 + Space Commander Bundle
description: Become a legend of air combat! Three thrilling flight combat games together - Warplanes: WW1 Sky Aces, Warplanes: WW2 Dogfight and Space Commander: War and Trade.

name: Warplanes: WW1 + Space Commander Bundle
description: Become a legend of air combat! Two thrilling flight combat games together - Warplanes: WW1 Sky Aces and Space Commander: War and Trade.

name: Warplanes: WW2 + Space Commander Bundle
description: Become a legend of air combat! Two thrilling flight combat games together - Warplanes: WW2 Dogfight and Space Commander: War and Trade.

name: The Spirit Guide
description: Play as the titular Spiritguide Ale in this beautiful top down 2D pixel art RPG. It's the night of the day of the dead festival, and families both celebrate and mourn their loved ones. You must take their gifts, and good memories and deliver it to the Spirits, so they may never forget who they are.

name: Slum Guide
description: Explore a mysterious slum town and recruit women seeking fortune. Use them as fighters in a coliseum or to defend yourself against local threats. As a cunning guide, gather intel, use tools, and manipulate secrets to immerse them into the town's hidden desires.

name: The Zombie Survival Guide
description: this is a 2D side scrolling real-time combat game Players can use AD to control characters' walking, space to jumping, and E-key interaction to explore the world, complete attack commands through the mouse, and use all the weapons provided in the story to resist zombies.

name: Iseikan Renai Guide: Interplanetary Love Guide
description: This PC game is a love simulation game set in the distant future where interstellar travel has become commonplace. Slavery, crime, violence... Interact with unique aliens and form close relationships with them in a world where anything is possible, where high technology and low technology coexist.

name: The Underworld of Brain Damage
description: Players can't attack. Players need to avoid attacks in the game and lead monsters' attacks to other monsters. Let the monster kill himself! ! ! The game map is random, the elements in the map are random, and there are many strange props, so that players have different game experiences every time.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Cosmonaut β, Wearing a Helmet: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Cosmonaut β."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Colonist β, Heart of Brocade: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Colonist β."

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Wing Diver Independently Operated Equipment - Handy Saber Type 0
description: A device that generates a blade of energy.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Ranger Weapons: Broken MR98 Fang
description: A high-caliber sniper rifle with a damaged scope.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Ranger Weapons - Aerial Reverser M0
description: A special capsule containing nanomachines. When the capsule strikes a target, it explodes and disperses nanomachines over a wide area.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Ranger Weapons - A60 Binary Round
description: A chemical explosive.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Ranger Piloted Weapons - Blacker No. 6
description: A combat vehicle with a special paint job.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - BRB, Freebike Ranger (EDF5) Joins the Fight
description: Adds the character "BRB, Freebike Ranger (EDF5)."

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Strengthening Parts for Fencer - Gunner's Exoskeleton
description: Special exoskeleton tuned for gunfire.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Ranger Boarding Weapons - Free Bike No. 6
description: Custom military motorcycle.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Fencer Weapons - Power Blade Zero
description: A blade for close combat. It produces a jet of light to slash the enemy.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Fencer Weapons - 'OneeChanbara Origin' illustrated 'Disguised Body Pillow'.
description: A hammer disguised as a body pillow with the same specs as the Vibro Hammer.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Air Raider Boarding Weapons - Naegling No. 6
description: Specially painted carrier equipped with multipurpose missiles.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Air Raider Boarding Weapons - Eros No. 6
description: Armed helicopter with a special paint job.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Fencer Weapons - Proto Reflector
description: A shield that reverses movement.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - World's Greatest Engineer, Air Raider (EDF5) Civilian Outfit: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Air Raider (EDF5) Civilian Outfit."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Sorry To Keep You Waiting: Master Air Raider Joins the Fight
description: Adds the character "Master Air Raider."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - I've Been Waiting: Special Appearance by The Professor from EDF6
description: Adds the character "The Professor."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Incredible Cargo Loader, Fencer (EDF5) Civilian Outfit: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Fencer (EDF5) Civilian Outfit."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Humanity Dominates!? Wing Diver (EDF6) Up & Coming: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Wing Diver (EDF6) Up & Coming."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Just This Once: Special Appearance by The Lieutenant from EDF6
description: Adds the character "The Lieutenant."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Sky Dancer, Wing Diver (EDF5) Civilian Outfit: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Wing Diver (EDF5) Civilian Outfit."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Humanity's Security Officer, Ranger (EDF5) Civilian Outfit: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Ranger (EDF5) Civilian Outfit."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Humanity Dominates!? Fencer (EDF6) Up & Coming: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Fencer (EDF6) Up & Coming."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Humanity Dominates!? Air Raider (EDF6) Up & Coming: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Air Raider (EDF6) Up & Coming."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Extra Mission Pack: Robo Saurous vs. The Mecharmy
description: A collection of additional missions featuring many new enemies that did not appear in the main game. Included in this collection is another story that took place in the time line corresponding to missions 79 to 83 of the main game.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Don't Bring Civilians Into This: Special Appearance by The Captain from EDF6
description: Adds the character "The Captain."

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - Azure Dragon
description: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - Dragon Slayer
description: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - Judgment
description: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

description: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

name: Tanbo
description: "Tanbo" is a short walking simulator horror game in which you take a walk along a rice paddy path at night with your dog, Bonta.

name: Chirashiiru
description: A puzzle game where you have to follow the arranged themes.

name: Energy Crush
description: This is a 2D online shooting game. Up to four players can play against each other. It is still in development, so there is only one mode and few types of players. I would like to hear the opinions of users, so I would appreciate it if you could review it even if it is a small thing.

name: Kokoro Talkers
description: A boy with amnesia and a girl with the power of "Monomane" allowing her to possess "objects." Talk to everything within the abandoned school—from keypads to computers—to reclaim lost memories and restore the future!

name: Ask Gear Re:Boost
description: A new, straightforward RPG! Hot scenarios and battles that go right to the heart of JRPGs. For those of you who still feel your youth in the RPGs of the PS1 and PS2 generations, this is the game for you.

name: Eden Tactics
description: Eden Tactics is a competitive digital card game. Simple rules and deep reading, casual digital cards for a new era. Read your opponent's hand and make the best move!

name: Project Solaris
description: A rogue-lite RPG about the 100-day challenge of Solaris, a Less magic power witch, and her sidekick Homu, with beautifully animated combat, quick-time events, and charming characters to interact with!

name: Totonoi Simulator
description: The Totoi simulator is a simulator to feel “Totoi” by slowly soaking in a hot spring, taking a sauna, or bathing in a water bath, The Totoi Simulator is a simulator that allows you to feel “Totoi” by slowly soaking in a hot spring, taking a sauna, or taking a water bath.

name: Sakura-iro Tetra Prism
description: Sin descripción

name: Laby to Panel de Shiritori
description: Play picture word chain with Laby, the knowledgeable robot! Fun for one player or two!

name: 0101: Classic Bonus Levels 3
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Classic levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: 0101: Counter Bonus Levels 3
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Counter levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: 0101: Pusher Bonus Levels 3
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Pusher levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: Murder Mystery J: Satsujinhan ha Soba ni iru
description: Everyone is a suspect!? Up to 12 players can compete online! Using the communication function of your device, you can compete online with up to 12 players anytime, anywhere, with anyone, and as many times as you want!

description: You can use new faces for the "impersonation characters" that you use during battles. Only a set of 30 characters will be sold.

name: Tiny Devils
description: Tiny Devils is a fast-paced multiplayer party game for 1-4 players. Race, jump, and climb through crazy obstacle courses, using wild power-ups like bees and magnets to mess with your rivals. Grab the crown and race to the finish line—the first one there wins, but chaos is guaranteed!
