name: 07Gorillas
description: 07Gorillas is a top-down roguelike arena shooter game, you control one gorilla from a squad of seven break into "Foggy Zone" on a cleanup mission. Missions lasts less than 20 minutes, fight your way with powerful kung fu and tactical consumables, don't foget internal force enhancement.

name: Battle Spirits: Character Sleep Set 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle Spirits: Character Play Sheet Set 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Hardcore Circus
description: Hardcore Circus is an intense action-platformer where you play as Dik, a skilled acrobat on a daring quest to rescue his brother Alex from the grasp of the Devil. Face devilish traps and brutal challenges that will push your acrobatic abilities to the limit.

name: Full Metal Sergeant 2
description: The Sergeant is back. Ready to turn unqualified recruits into fearless war machines. Manage your camp and prepare your squad with tougher training and new challenges, will they be ready for a real battlefield? New skill tree, more abilities and a reworked battle system. Start you deployment now.

name: Just Platformer 100
description: "Just Platformer 100" is a platformer game that focuses on the pure enjoyment of the genre itself. The game starts with simple levels and gradually introduces new rules. As these simple rules accumulate, the game continuously takes on new aspects.

name: 100 Screamers
description: 100 Screamers is a horror about a policewoman who came to a call, but turned out to be a toy in the hands of a maniac. Will she commit terrible things to survive or will she find a way out of a hopeless situation?

name: Project Rebirth
description: Fight for your life in a high-security prison where dangerous experiments have unleashed a deadly mutation. Solve puzzles, hide from a crazy doctor, and survive intense encounters as you attempt to escape this nightmare.

name: 1000 Waves
description: 1000 Waves is a bullet hell arcade game that becomes progressively difficult as you approach the 1000th wave. Strengthen your ship by leveling up and conquer the final boss!

name: 100 Animals on an Island
description: Embark on an incredible adventure on an island where 100 adorable animals await you! Explore the mysterious island and try to find all the creatures hidden in the game.

name: 100 Cats New York: Extra Content
description: Play a brand new level enriched with intricate details. 100 Cats have once again decided to hide themselves in New York.

name: 100 Hiddensaurs: Egypt
description: This is DLC for 100 Hiddensaurs. Find all the dinosaurs of Ancient Egypt.

name: 100 Dogs in India
description: Find 100 dogs in India! A simple hidden object game made with Kivy. Do you recognize the real-life buildings in the background?

name: 100 Korea Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Korea Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: 100 New Year Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 New Year Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: Gridhack
description: Gridhack is a sci-fi puzzle RPG where you fight nonogram battles to hack your way on an intergalactic quest as you try to find out what happened to a planet called.. Earth?

name: VR Catgirl Isle 2100
description: This is a fascinating VR leisure game, a game with giant catwoman is about to begin.

name: Maximum Chaser: 1001 Squad
description: It is a universe similar to ours, where humans are technologically advanced but also full of evil. You will play as 2 member of the street organization "Maximum Chaser" and confront an evil security company A.A.S.S., making them scream under your gunfire.

name: 100% Wedding Mission: Love Love Christmas
description: 100% Wedding Mission! is a real time strategy game playable only for a streamer with 45~ viewers. Gather gold and upgrade chat viewer's Unit! Collaborate with chat and streamers to capture the Love

name: The Vast White
description: Explore an old mountain at your pace in this openworld snowboarding adventure. Uncover hidden paths, experience dynamic weather, and explore stunning landscapes as you ride. Every path holds new secrets.

name: Nekomancer of Nowhere
description: Draw spells on your screen as the Nekomancer! Swap between the realms of life and death, revive ghosts, and uncover Tombstone Tower's haunting truth!

name: Freeky Faucets Arcade
description: In Freeky Faucets, you play as these round beetle bugs called Boogas. The Faucets have invaded ally grounds! Eeeyikes! Don't worry hero, Faucet Friend will assist! (for a price). Discover his comrades too!

name: Elder Lich
description: Elder Lich is set in a world almost identical to 19th century Earth, except there's magic, undead, Germany is split between a South German Federation, a North German Federation and, between them, a country barely bigger than a city-state, Schadel.

name: Mr. Wolf
description: Little red riding hood and wolf are rival

name: Towny Bar
description: Discover an Idle Management Game full of surprises. Take the reins of an old abandoned bar and improve and expand it to the delight of the inhabitants of Towny Town. During the story you will meet some of your neighbors, who will gladly help you in your hard tasks. Grow ingredients in your garden, craft drinks in your cellar, run your own arcade, unlock special abilities and discover forgotten mysteries, but above all, serve as many drinks as you can!

name: Intrusive Thoughts
description: A short story that turns everyday tasks into journeys. Can you be the voice that doesn’t let her down?

name: Autogun Heroes: Supercharged
description: Blast through alien-infested planets and help Gus assemble a team of powerful heroes to save the galaxy. This challenging shoot 'em up 2D action platformer combines brutal chaos with smooth, responsive controls. Dodge. Roll. Dominate!

name: Super Sapiens
description: Super Sapiens is a trivia game developed by Coronel for ZX Spectrum 48K, +3DOS, ZX Spectrum 128 +3. Launched in 1989 by SYGRAN Publishing Group

name: Rogue Monster Rush
description: Rogue Monster Rush is a blend of roguelike and tower defense. Collect and command an array of monster defenders, unleash strategic player abilities, unlock tons of upgrades, to defend your town from the invading robots.

name: Diamond Word
description: Diamond Word is a word action game where you need to make quick decisions, making the needed words from the letters flying up. Direct the letter to the place where you plan to make a word. Erase unnecessary words, making room on the field for the necessary (Diamond) word.

name: PawnShop Simulator
description: Turn the space into a pawn shop! Use fresh paint, stylish floors, and organized shelves to display your items. Buy and sell different goods, making smart, profitable deals. Keep the shop clean to attract customers and sell your items.

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Omens of Destruction: Gorbad
description: Introduces one of the most infamous of all Orc Warbosses, Gorbad Ironclaw, as a playable Legendary Lord alongside a deadly host of new battle units, gameplay features and objectives to be experienced in the immense Immortal Empires campaign or Custom Battles.

name: Kemotaku
description: "Kemotaku" is a brand new roguelike card game mixed with puzzle, deck-building and tower-defence. Beat away attacking enemies and defend your town with a variety of animals!

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 8
description: This dlc contains 3 classic tables: Banzai Run, Black Knight 2000, and Earthshaker.

name: The Ouroboros Express
description: Play as Vivienne Sanssouci, a daring journalist who has been tasked to review the Ouroboros Express. She quickly notices that this is not your regular train—and a devastating secret changes her life forever, and that of the other passengers…

name: Sintopia
description: Build the resurrection business of your dreams with Sintopia! You are charged with managing the bureaucratic administration of Hell, your team of Imployees punish the dead souls for their Sins, generating a profit to help you build and sustain your Hellish empire.

name: The Accuser and the Abyss
description: You are a detective. You have been assigned a partner to investigate a horrid case. But things are not what it seems. Navigate the paths as you attempt to unravel the truth behind your lost memories and your new disturbing detective partner.

name: DCS World: MAD AH-64D Campaign by Stone Sky
description: And the battle rages on! This time you are an officer of the UAE Air Force, with Bedouin ancestry; a pilot of the Special Operations Squadron - Captain Khalid Al-Mansouri. You will take part in a series of interesting campaigns; MAD - Mutual Assured Destruction. Detailed and high-quality work from Stone Sky will once again surprise you.

name: Serena
description:
"I wish she could remember our days together."

Serena is a short story where we meet a white-haired girl and, in turn, discover that she needs our blood to survive.

Why does she seem so sad? Will I be able to do anything for her?

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Rise of the Persian Lion II Campaign by Badger 633
description: As staccato shafts of burning light flashed by the canopy, Lieutenant Scott Rivers, call sign 'Ford', squeezed the release button. He felt the expected "kick in the pants" as the Hornet surged when a ton of self-guiding ordinance dropped away intent on finding its mark. Below, seconds later, there was a massive shock wave as the area where the I.R.G.C. meeting was being held, exploded into ‘Hell on earth’ lighting up the entire City.

name: Kingdom Flipper
description: Grab a broom and hammer, it’s time to flip castles! Take drab strongholds and transform them into palaces fit for royalty. Take jobs, buy land, and build your dream castle all for profit, of course!

name: DCS World: MAD JF-17 Thunder Campaign by Stone Sky
description: This campaign guides the player through a gripping storyline about a PMC pilot named Vitalii Gerasimov. You will take part in a series of campaigns called MAD Mutually assured Destruction.

name: DCS World: Spitfire Beware! Beware! Campaign by Reflected Simulations
description: During the winter of 1942-43, the air battle raging in the skies over Europe was at its fiercest. The Focke Wulfs and Messerschmitts flown by the Luftwaffe’s ’experten’ proved to be more than a worthy foe for the RAF’s new Spitfire Mk.IX-s. The air supremacy of the Allies was still just a distant dream. In the thickest of this battle stood the Biggin Hill Wing with 611 (West Lancashire) and 340 (Ile de France) Squadrons.

name: Shadows of Progakko
description:
Adam Samishi went to live at Progakko, a huge school with the purpose of protecting teenagers from a threat that occurs in the country, however, nobody knows what exactly this threat is.

Note:
This game was originally released on Gamejolt, then re-released on Itch.io a few months later.
At the time the developer was known as SlothOgami/ShinOgami, only later it became Kuraishimi.

name: LEGO Fortnite: Brick Life
description:
Build your new life in an ever-evolving LEGO city.

Experience a highly social destination for up to 32 players where you can explore all the city has to offer!

Be the ultimate socialite and hang out in restaurants, house parties or rooftop clubs. Chat with friends or make new ones, activities in LEGO Fortnite Brick Life are better together. Host a band practice down the beach, grab a bite to eat with others or race through the streets on hover boards.

Take on a job, complete tasks to earn some spending money and start living the life in Brick Bay with vehicles, housing and more. Customize your home with furnishings from the local store or invite your friends over to hang out.

Getting this experience is not necessary to access this content. When you launch Fortnite using this through your Library, the experience will be pre-selected for your convenience.

name: Extinction Day
description: Extinction Day is a doomsday simulator where you wipe out humanity using disasters, diseases, wars, and other catastrophic events. Spread chaos worldwide, combine catastrophes for maximum destruction, and crush humanity's efforts to survive in this game of world-ending mayhem.

name: A Game About Digging A Hole
description: A minimalist game about digging a hole in the garden of a newly purchased house. Collect resources, sell them, upgrade your equipment and discover a mysterious secret. Costs you only one coffee!

name: Helldivers 2: TR-117 Alpha Commander Armor Set
description:
TR-117 ALPHA COMMANDER
For warriors who are so strong and confident that they don't need any reassurance whatsoever.

name: Bridge Constructor Studio
description:
Test your construction expertise with dozens of distinct bridge-building puzzles across varied biomes. Seven different vehicles and multiple construction materials (wood, steel, cables, concrete pillars, and roadways) ensure each puzzle is a fresh and varied challenge.

With no budget restrictions or material limits, you are free to experiment and design without constraints. For an extra challenge, earn a special award by keeping costs within a set budget while ensuring your bridge holds up under pressure!

Design and play your very own bridge-building scenarios! Choose from five biomes, seven vehicles, and a variety of obstacles and checkpoints to design your own challenges. Up to 40 custom levels can be saved per player profile.

Mixed Reality (Quest 3 Exclusive): View your creations in the real world with Mixed Reality! Seamlessly switch between VR and Passthrough modes to experience the game in a whole new way.

name: No Man's Sky: Starborn Phoenix Ship
description:
An exclusive reforged starship, commemorating a time when Travellers old and new joined together to voyage across the stars.

This unusual ship is optimised for effortless gliding during flight, while a localised vector field allows the craft to hover above solid planes.

To add this ship to your collection, visit the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion aboard the Space Anomaly and choose "Collect Special Rewards".

name: Opera Prima
description: Sin descripción

name: DCS World: Iraq Map
description: Experience the full scope of Iraq's diverse and historically rich environment with DCS: Iraq. Fly over the entire country, from the deserts of the south to the mountains of the north, and immerse yourself in a landscape that has been the backdrop for some of the most significant air campaigns in history.

name: DCS World: Iraq North Map
description: Dive into the rugged terrains and historically significant regions of Northern Iraq. This module offers a richly detailed environment featuring the mountainous landscapes, rivers, and urban centres that have been central to numerous military operations. From the ancient city of Mosul to the oil-rich fields of Kirkuk, Northern Iraq presents a challenging and varied theatre.

name: Football Life 2025
description: Football Life 2025 game is an attempt to continue the offline modes of the retired PES series, football life is a standalone football game based on PES 21, built for offline career modes only. SP Football Life is how we like to play a football game.

name: Warframe: Nyx Warframe
description:
Warframe is pulling up to The Game Awards 2024 with plenty of goodies and great news to share!

Claim now to receive a free Nyx Warframe with a free Warframe Slot, for a limited time only.

name: CheckOut
description: Checkout is a psychological horror walking simulator where players attempt to escape from endlessly looping hotel corridors. The game delivers an intense immersion with its tension-building soundtrack and realistic graphics. Unravel the hidden stories and find your way out of the hotel.

name: Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound
description: A brand-new side-scrolling entry to the NINJA GAIDEN series from the team behind Blasphemous, NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound redefines the classic platformer saga in a spectacular, thrilling and challenging ninja adventure.

name: One Move Away
description: One Move Away is a cozy, first-person puzzle game where you pack your belongings for another move and embark on a new chapter in life. With each move, you step into the lives of three unique characters, uncovering their personal stories through the items they take with them—or leave behind.

name: Dave the Diver: In the Jungle
description: Dave the Diver: In the Jungle is a DLC expansion for Dave the Diver. It introduces a new jungle-themed environment where players can explore for exotic resources and face additional challenges, all while continuing to balance underwater exploration with restaurant management.

name: Shadow Labyrinth
description: Shadow Labyrinth is a 2D action platformer and a genre-twisting alternate take on the iconic PAC-MAN. As The Swordsman, you wake on a mysterious planet amidst relics of wars past. To survive you will discover secrets, consume your enemies, and grow from prey to apex predator.

name: Steel Paws
description: Embark on a dynamic action adventure game as a girl alongside her buddy robots to conquer a mysterious tower that reappears every century.

name: Stalcraft: X - Operations
description: Sin descripción

name: Kyora
description: Delve into KYORA, a mystical multiplayer sandbox adventure, where every pixel is yours to shape, mine, build or explode.

name: Rematch
description: Control one player on your team and compete in fast-paced 5v5 matches from an immersive third-person perspective. Team up with your friends and join the action.

name: Solasta II
description: In a Mana-infused land, a dark force led by the enigmatic Shadwyn threatens Neokos. Bring your party of adventurers together across perilous realms in this Turn-Based Tactical RPG based on the SRD 5e ruleset. You make the choices, dice decide your destiny.

name: Elden Ring: Nightreign
description: Elden Ring: Nightreign is a standalone adventure within the ELDEN RING universe, crafted to bring a new gaming experience.

name: Catly
description: An open-world adventure filled with surprises and joy, side by side with Cats! Build your dream island, meet various characters, and enjoy caring for your cats, dressing up, building, farming, racing, skiing, and much more! Explore freely and have endless fun with your furry companions!

name: Untitled GenDesign Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Split Fiction
description: Embrace mind-blowing moments as you’re pulled deep into the many worlds of Split Fiction, a boundary-pushing co-op adventure.

name: Blackfrost: The Long Dark 2
description: A year after the Aurora’s appearance & the world went dark, the people of Harmont & its vast wild environs struggle to survive the Quiet Apocalypse. Survive alone or with others against a host of new hazards & a fresh new survival sandbox from a pioneer of the genre. Live together. Die alone.

name: Tekken 8: Clive Rosfield
description:
Clive Rosfield, the first prince of the Grand Duchy of Rosaria, from FINAL FANTASY XVI joins the tournament!

Experience thrilling swordplay and precision coordinated attacks with Clive's loyal hound, Torgal. Wield powerful and dynamic Eikonic abilities and temporarily transform into the mighty Ifrit. Use your power as the Dominant of Fire to emerge victorious.

Content:
- Clive Rosfield as a playable character

name: Untitled Virtua Fighter Game
description:
We're excited to unveil a special preview of the concept video for the "New VIRTUA FIGHTER Project." This video was presented at the Consumer Electronics Show, the world's largest electronics trade fair, during the keynote speech by NVIDIA's founder and CEO, Jensen Huang.

Please note that this is a concept video created before development began. The actual gameplay and characters may differ from what is shown.

name: Project Century
description: An unreleased spin-off game of the Yakuza franchise set in early 1900s Japan.

name: Turok: Origins
description: Play as the legendary Turok warriors to face off against ferocious dinosaurs and a terrifying alien threat that seeks to destroy all human life across the galaxy.

name: Helldivers 2: Omens of Tyranny
description: The sightings, rumors, conspiracy theories. They were all true. The ancient Illuminate civilization are back from extinction!

name: Onimusha: Way of the Sword
description:
Fight through bloodstained battlefields of intense swordplay action. Explore the historic Japanese capital of Edo-era Kyoto, twisted by malevolent clouds of Malice.
With every stage cloaked in mystery, danger and intrigue. Battle against monstrosities from the underworld known as Genma in a tale of dark fantasy.
Follow the tale of a samurai who wields the Oni Gauntlet, a mystical artifact that grants its bearer the power to slay Genma.
Through gritty, blood-soaked brawls, he searches for his reason to fight. What fate awaits at the end of his path?

name: Dungeon & Fighter: Arad
description: Sin descripción

name: Stage Fright
description: From the makers of OVERCOOKED! comes an all new co-operative experience. Take your friend on an amazing adventure as you explore, solve escape rooms, overcome fiendish obstacles and unravel an ancient mystery.

name: Game of Thrones: Kingsroad
description:
Enter the world of the HBO hit series, Game of Thrones.
Experience an open-world action RPG with an original story found only in Game of Thrones: Kingsroad!

name: Monster Hunter Now: Season 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Screamer
description: High-octane action and anime aesthetics collide in this arcade racing game, featuring fighting mechanics and a storyline that hits hard. In this world, some race for glory while others seek power or revenge. Every race is a fight and every battle is personal.

name: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds
description: Race across land, sea, air, space, and time in Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds! Warp through Travel Rings into new dimensions where something new awaits around every twist and turn.

name: Dispatch
description: Dispatch is a superhero workplace comedy where choices matter. Manage a dysfunctional team of misfit heroes and strategize who to send to emergencies around the city, all while balancing office politics, personal relationships, and your own quest to become a hero.

name: Okami Sequel
description: Sin descripción

name: Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet
description: Set thousands of years in the future, Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet puts players into the role of Jordan A. Mun, a dangerous bounty hunter who ends up stranded on Sempiria – a distant planet whose communication with the outside universe went dark hundreds of years ago. Jordan will have to use all her skills and wits if she hopes to be the first person in over 600 years to leave its orbit.

name: Dungeonfell
description:
Enter the World of Dungeonfell,

A tactical team-based Roguelite where you lead a group of heroes into ever-changing dungeons. Battle against hordes of Monsters and uncover the corruption lurking deep within the dungeon’s heart.

Learn the unique abilities of each Hero and unlock new spells and skills as you progress. Combine your heroes strategically to create powerful synergies and overcome the increasingly difficult enemies you face.

name: Meat Girl
description:
Your roommate went missing several months ago.

You finally gain a conscience and go look for her.

You find a strange girl in the woods.

name: Lost in Anomaly
description: You wake up on the 9th floor of an unknown building. The only way out of here is to detect and mark anomalies. One wrong move and you could be trapped forever.

name: Cartas de Coisas
description:
A game within a game, Cartas de Coisas (Cards of Things) invites players to wager on a gacha simulator to win cards representing animals, games, cultural icons, and literary figures. These cards contribute to your Fighting Power, a resource essential for facing and hunting down hordes of aliens within the Liturgy. Each opened Gate reveals a new epistle—fragmented stories that unveil the creation of every layer of the game's universe.

On its official page, Cards of Things (Cartas de Coisas) describes itself this way:

"There is a game called Cards of Things, which some people believe can replace the weariness of life with a terrible feeling known as Agony.
Of course, you don't want to live in Agony: just stay away from these cards.
After all, you should be working.
You like your job.
Staring at the wall.
You don't need the torment of Agony."

name: Prey of the Night
description: Become a night owl, soaring through an infinite forest under the moonlit sky. Skillfully avoid obstacles, hunt for prey to gain strength, and perch to regain stamina. But beware—every moment in the shadows tests your survival. How long can you conquer the night?

name: Watermelon Simulator
description: Watermelon Simulator is a game in which you can become a watermelon.

name: Bit-Cremental: Fishistry
description: Grow fish with a gashapon twist in this bite-sized idler. Feed, nurture, and watch as fisher people reel in mature catches, earning money to upgrade things like feeding, growth, and fishing speeds for even faster profits.

name: Tile Cities 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiny Divide
description: Endlessly split tiles into smaller fragments and compete on the leaderboard to reach the tiniest divide.

name: Cargo 19
description: Play as a brave pilot navigating a spaceship through the wastelands. Explore diverse locations, gathering resources to fulfill contracts while carefully planning your routes and avoiding damage to your ship.

name: Project Search
description: Project Search is a visual novel of Chinese immortality cultivation. Scholar Qian Jiangmin investigates collapsed pagodas in Linhai's old town while searching for his missing brother. With the help of Daoist cultivators, he explores grotto-heavens and uncovers the truth behind his double vision.

name: Celestial Orbiter Auranova: Those Who Denounce God
description:
In a future that refused to change, witness those who struggle for love and freedom, the atrocities committed by those in power, and the roaring cry of Those Who Denounce "God".
Celestial Orbiter Auranova - Those Who Denounce God, is an 80s mecha/prog rock inspired kinetic visual novel set in the distant future about a scrappy team of freedom fighters, the mysterious mecha they found, and their battle against an empire of corporations.

name: Agents of Groove
description:
In a world where music and dancing have real power, a group of undercover dancers stumbles upon an evil conspiracy -- but will they be able to stop it?

Join field agent Daley Bellbottoms, information expert Melody Handler, and your other fellow agents as the new recruit of secret agency G.R.O.O.V.E., and help them find their... well, groove, on a daring mission around the world. Their tools? Dancing, mastery of rhythm, incredible style, and... okay, mostly dancing.

name: Saltwater Bodies
description:
Operate a tourist attraction by day, and conduct eldritch experiments by night to build yourself a new vessel.

Explore cave systems in a fully physics-based caving/swimming system, where you'll have to twist your head and breathe out precious air to fit through openings.

The narrative has a few branching points, depending on events that happen during dives or out on dry land.

name: Escape Simulator 2
description: Sequel to the best-selling escape room game, brings a fresh take on first-person puzzles with a variety of new rooms to explore solo or with friends. Solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden secrets, or craft your own escape rooms with Room Editor 2.0.

name: Void Sails
description: Void Sails is a single-player adventure where you captain a flying ship across uncharted space. Sail through mysterious worlds, battle powerful foes, and make story-defining choices. Uncover dark secrets in a game where every discovery could bring you closer to the truth—or to madness.

name: Brok: Natal Tail, A New Christmas
description: A Christmas tale set in the world of BROK the InvestiGator, presented as a visual novel.

name: DCS World: F-14B Operation Sandworm Campaign by Sandman Simulations
description: It is the year 1998. Tension is building up in the Persian Gulf region. Violations of human rights, demonstrations terminated by the military and executions of political prisoners in Iran have led to financial sanctions set by United States and European Union. Iran has responded with airspace violations and disruptions of commercial shipping. Diplomats are doing their best but the Gulf states and the World are afraid of war.

name: T-Dragon Quest: Joshou Yuusha no Mezame
description: T-Dragon Quest is a fan-made role playing game in the Dragon Quest series which was only made for the X68000 Sharp System.

name: T-Dragon Quest 2: Mazoku no Daichi
description: T-Dragon Quest Mazoku No Daichi is the second unofficial fan-made game from Enix’s Dragon Quest series made by TNB Saisakusho for the Sharp X68000 in 1992.

name: Kraken City
description: She is the dark magician, an apostle of the great Kraken, Nialato. Show the foolish mortals the terrifying power of the Kraken through brute strength and magical prowess Experience the thrill of hack-and-slash action alongside the fearsome Kraken

name: Die in the Dungeon: Classic
description: Fight your way through a mysterious dungeon in this deck-building, turn-based roguelike where you don't use cards, but dice! Deal with enemies by combining powerful dice on your board and risk it all hoping for a good roll on unexpected encounters.

name: Error Codes
description: You Go in Pursuit of you Best Friend who has recently gone missing. but your spaceship gets shot down by a rogue group of Robots. With no communication with earth, you must survive, Fight, and discover the secrets of this Ice Planet. (2024)

name: Spirit City: Lofi Sessions - Cozy Kitchen
description: Sin descripción

name: Undisputed: Deluxe WBC Edition
description: Become Undisputed and rule the ring in the most authentic boxing game to date! Featuring true to life visuals, bone-jarring action, and more licensed boxers than ever before, Undisputed gives you unprecedented control to master every inch of the ring.

name: Way of the Hunter: Hunter's Pack
description:
The Way of the Hunter Hunter's Pack:
• a shotgun, with engravings.
• a paintjob for the Car.
• a big wooden carved mouflon statue for the lodge.

This DLC is also part of the Map Pack 1 and the Elite Edition.

name: Way of the Hunter: Wild Expeditions
description:
Way of the Hunter: Wild Expeditions is the ultimate compilation of hunting grounds all over the world. In this authentic hunting simulation, you can explore the vast the in-game wilderness and fulfil all your hunting fantasies. The wide world of Way of the Hunter allows you to follow the many storylines in hunting grounds all over the world, master the challenges of ethical hunting and solve intriguing cases of unethical behaviour. Or venture out in free hunt, and explore the breath-taking landscapes of North America, Europe, New Zealand and Africa to learn about habitats, animal behaviour and ultimately how to manage animal fitness in order to harvest the rarest and most impressive trophies.

This latest edition bundles 6 enormous hunting areas and includes agile UTVs for off-roading. All of this has been enriched with the cosmetics of the Hunter's Pack and the Outfits Pack: 5 alternative outfits for your playable hunters, a beautifully engraved antique shotgun, a cameo paintjob for the car and an impressive wooden carved statue for your Transylvania hunting lodge.

Wild Expeditions includes 6 amazing DLCs:

• Tikamoon Plains is a huge new hunting ground in Africa. Explore diverse landscapes, from windy mountains to deadly deserts and vast savannahs teeming with life. Join Malachi, a professional hunting guide, as he leads a group of adventurers through the thrilling world of Tikamoon Plains, inspired by the African wilderness. Includes bowhunting and 2 top-of-the-line hunting bows.

• Aurora Shores is a breath-taking hunting area in the northernmost part of the USA, the Alaskan wilderness. As a fresh graduate of the Wildlife Trooper School, your job is to protect the natural resources of Aurora Shores. Explore untouched nature with rich populations of wild animals, such as Kodiak bears, Roosevelt elk, Wood bison, and many more. Includes crossbows.

• Matariki Park in New Zealand offers a remarkable blend of biomes. Traverse hilly or mountainous terrain, home to the unique Himalayan tahr and the mighty Sambar deer, and venture into the lowland forest areas, the domain of the majestic Red deer. Immerse yourself in nature's beauty and lifelike wildlife that will keep you engaged for hours, all while offering insights into unique local habits and traditions.

• Lintukoto Reserve is an amazing hunting ground in Scandinavia and the newest addition to Way of the Hunter. Experience the adventures of game warden Mikael and discover the nature and animals of the European North.

• The Outfits Pack contains one original costume for each character - River, April, Wallace, Jackie and Malachi, usable in Free Hunt and Multiplayer mode.

• Hunter's Pack: a shotgun with engravings, a paintjob for the Car, and a wooden carved mouflon statue for the lodge

name: Pangea 1/2
description: Sin descripción

name: Home_0
description:
Home_0 is a phycological horror where you play as 9-year-old boy relieving his memories on the most horrifying week.

Help yourself to get rid of the anomalies in your memories by choosing the right choice.

name: Appetit
description: A mixed reality cooking assistant to improve your life in the kitchen!

name: Cats Visiting Christmas Town
description: Embark on a Christmas quest to uncover hidden cats in charming holiday scenes filled with snowmen, festive shops, and a grand tree adorned with gifts.

name: Kimi ga Nozomu Muv-Luv
description:
Fandisc released for free to members of the age Fan Club, Kimi ga Nozomu Muv-Luv contains two stories:

-Ore ga Hetare de Hetare ga Ore de:
A crossover for Kimi ga Nozomu Eien and Muv-Luv where the protagonists for each game swap bodies, and wacky hijinks ensue!

-Melvina Maniax
A short story about daily life of the JFK Curry Restaurant crew.

name: Osaka's Dream
description: Osaka's friends have been kidnapped by a mysterious entity. Find them by looking through a whopping 1 level in this demo.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Wednesday's Infidelity
description: Wednesday's Infidelity is a fan-made modification (mod) of the rhythm game Friday Night Funkin'. The mod falls under the horror-themed rhythm game genre, blending music-based gameplay with a dark, psychological narrative. The mod follows a tormented version of Mickey Mouse, inspired by creepypasta and lost-media myths, as he faces despair and inner struggles. it features a vintage cartoon aesthetic, a haunting original soundtrack, and progressively intense stages that reflect Mickey's deteriorating mental state. Known for its engaging music, dynamic visuals, and emotional depth, the mod offers a chilling twist on the traditional FNF experience. This mod is the creation of some very iconic songs such as: "Unknown Suffering" and "Last Straw".

name: Nick Brawl Community Edition
description: It's time to get back into the Brawl! Introducing Nick Brawl Community Edition, a community-made patch for the Steam version of Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl full of bug-fixes, new features, and more!

name: Hashire Hebereke: EX
description: Hashire Hebereke: EX is a modern remake of the 1994-released Super Famicom racing action game Hashire Hebereke by SUNSOFT. Players can choose from comical and cute characters like series protagonist Hebe and partake in extreme races across unique stages. While carrying over elements from the original game, it will add a new Time Attack mode, new characters, and new stages, as well as four-person online multiplayer support.

name: Pyromania
description: Pyromania is an action-packed horde survival game. Strategy and movement are key to surviving the ever-growing hordes of zombies, wild animals and other monsters. It can be played either solo or in online-coop with up to 4 players.

name: Nine-Ball Roulette
description: This will be the most exciting pool game you have ever played. Join up to 3 of your friends in this exciting pool roulette game! Eliminate each other with pool until only one person is left.

name: Soulblaze
description: Soulblaze is a creature-collecting roguelite in which you catch and train creatures called animons to fight your way through several regions and defeat their bosses in tactical turn-based battles with dice rolling mechanics. Build your team, upgrade and customize techniques, collect stickers, and hopefully survive until the end!

name: Frog Detective -1
description:
If you look up the word Frog, detective, and prequel...well...you'd be reading a book and not playing this unofficial prequel to the Frog Detective games!

So put down that book and pick up the gauntlet that has been thrown down at your feet, to solve a mystery like no other.

Best played on an actual Game Boy (a pocket would be best!)
Download the ROM at the bottom of the page and use an emulator like BGB, Sameboy or MGBA to play!

name: Nils Holgerssons wunderbare Reise
description:
Selma Lagerlöf's classic children's book comes with the software Nils Holgersson's Wonderful Journey. Off to Lapland comes in a double pack: once as an active adventure game on CD-ROM, and once as an audio play for the CD player.

The young players slip into the role of the enchanted Nils Holgersson, a little thumbelina, and get to know life from an even smaller perspective. The journey, in which Akka, the leader of the wild geese, has to be freed, leads through eight different locations, from the farm to the forest and river to Kullaberg, before finally ending up at the treasure chest. Naughty Nils always annoys all the animals and he certainly doesn't listen to his parents. One day, however, he has a bad time when an elf enchants the boy into his own kind. As such, Nils flees into the straw pile and from there continues on the back of the pet goose Martin.

Now begins an exciting and, due to the adversities of nature, dangerous journey. Again and again, the players have to defend themselves against foxes, sometimes with cunning, sometimes with force, by asking the ram to drive the fox away with his horns. But there is still more to do: berries need to be collected, fish caught, a sleeping chamber built for the new friend Martin and the crows distracted. Many more clicks enable enjoyable little gimmicks, games and tasks.

name: LegacyShell
description: LegacyShell is a recreation of the old Shell Shockers game.

name: The Scouring
description: The Scouring is an RTS with fast pace, high attention to detail and next generation experience. Lead humans or orcs to fight for victory! Play alone or with friends. Use modding tools to create custom game modes! Join The battle!

name: Senpai and the Mysterious Island
description: An RPG where you get to uncover the secrets of a mysterious island inhabited by succubi that was rumored to contain a lost ancient technology. Play as either the warrior Hula Elstia, or Sonia Lanternlily to a variety of combat styles, and dress them up with various outfits.

name: Sonic X Shadow Generations: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 Movie Pack
description:
When transported to an unknown dimension, Shadow must race through the streets of modern-day Shibuya to defeat the forces of G.U.N.

Take on a new look as Shadow and play through a unique level inspired by the new movie, Sonic the Hedgehog 3, featuring the voice of Keanu Reeves!

name: Randotura
description: Randotura is a top-down action roguelike with inventory management. Dive into bullet hell action and collect unique modifiers, all in a selfmade dungeon.

name: Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas: Collector's Edition - Rhyme Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Bopimo!
description: A Free to play, online 3D platformer where players can create their own levels.

name: Astro Bot: Winter Wonder
description: The Christmas-themed DLC level for Astro Bot

name: Desktop Survivors 98
description: Desktop Survivors 98 is a chaotic roguelite dungeon crawler that unfolds right on your Desktop. Take control of your cursor as you explore new rooms, battle relentless waves of enemies, and collect powerful new weapons.

name: Deprision
description: Deprision is a psychological horror game that delivers an immersive and terrifying AAA experience. Survive human madness, amnesia's power, and navigate parallel worlds via a deadly virus. Solve your world's problem, survive, prevent more deaths, and escape before it's too late.

name: Cold Abyss: Directors Cut
description: COLD ABYSS is a relaxing and atmospheric exploration game where you repair internet cables on the bottom of the ocean.There are no enemies or other forms of danger down there. Just you.

name: Survive: Frost Bite
description: Trapped in an isolated Antarctic research base, you’re hunted by bloodthirsty werewolves after a brutal attack. With every passing second, survival becomes a desperate struggle—will you outsmart the creatures stalking you, or will the relentless terror tear you apart before help arrives?

name: Feed The Pit
description: JOIN THE SOCIETY. Avoid unpredictable horrors that will pursue you relentlessly. Perform rituals in a haunted forest to find dead bodies. Feed these bodies to THE PIT, lest you be fed to it yourself.

name: Amberspire
description: A science fantasy dice city builder. Construct buildings, manage resources, and build in harmony with an alien ecology. Beneath the glow of a gas giant, Amberspire will grow and prosper into a flourishing city atop the ruins of an abandoned moon.

name: Birchwood
description:
Birchwood is a narrative driven psychological horror game which delves into the dark-side of 1980’s Britain.
After an ecological and personal tragedy befell your household a decade earlier, you must now return home and uncover the morbid secrets which lay at the heart of the once idyllic farmhouse, while confronting the evil which destroyed your family.
Armed with nothing but a VHS camcorder, it’s up to you to solve the mystery of what really happened on that fateful night ten years ago.

name: Captain Midnight
description: The tide always wins

name: Christmas Drift: Delivery Simulator
description: Christmas Drift - Delivery Simulator Experience the ultimate holiday challenge! Drift through snowy roads, deliver gifts on time, and conquer festive obstacles in this fun, fast-paced driving simulator. Customize your vehicle, master tricky routes, and spread Christmas cheer like never before!

name: Shiver
description: A survival horror game where reality itself seems to unravel as you navigate the frozen hellscape to find your missing sister – defending yourself from horrors beyond our understanding, and nature itself. Solve puzzles, combat ice-covered nightmares, and most importantly, survive.

name: Pokemon Aquamarine
description:
Pokémon Aquamarine and its eight variants are ROM hacks of FireRed that takes place in Manta, an entirely new region based off South America. The player character mysteriously turns into a Mew, and takes on a journey as a Pokémon trainer to figure out how to turn back to human.

Each variant corresponds with a different Eevee evolution. The differences between versions are minor and mostly aesthetic, so it is recommended you go with your favorite!

These variations include:
Opal - Eevee
Aquamarine - Vaporeon
Topaz - Jolteon
Garnet - Flareon
Amethyst - Espeon
Onyx - Umbreon
Turquoise - Leafeon
Quartz - Glaceon
Zircon - Sylveon

Features:
New Region based off South America
New Subregions based off Hawaii, Galapagos, and Antarctica
Sci-Fi story with a diverging plot depending on gender
All 411 species of Pokémon are obtainable without the need to trade
Certain Pokémon from newer regions up until Paldea will appear
Custom Fakemon include a hummingbird line, a dolphin line, and a tortoise line
Updated mechanics, including the Fairy Type and the Physical/Special Split
Updated Pokémon learnsets to include a more diverse set of moves
Newer gen moves with custom animations
Expanded bag storage
Dynamically changing Pokémarts based off number of badges
Items from newer games include Bottle Caps, Nature Mints, Ability Capsules, and Choice Items
TMs have infinite uses
HMs can be forgotten
HMs and certain TMs can be used by the player character Mew as field effects
AMs (Ability Machines) can be used by the player character Mew as field effects
Key Item that provides hints for next objective, suggests level caps, and spawns unlimited rare candies
Key Items that provide services such as EV/IV checking and Move Tutoring
Color-Coded Natures
Pokédex accurately shows Pokémon locations and stats
Quality of life changes from newer games
Decapitalized most in-game text

name: DCS World: A-10C Operation Agile Spear Campaign by Combat King Simulations
description: In a surprise move, Russia has, again, invaded Georgia and the United Nations is unable or unwilling to provide even the most basic military response to this attack. Initially, only the United States commits a small but highly effective force of A-10C Warthogs to help defend its Black Sea ally.

name: DCS World: MiG-21bis Constant Peg Campaign by Bunyap Campaigns
description: The Constant Peg Campaign is based on operations carried out by the USAF's 4477th Test and Evaluation Squadron, the 'Red Eagles'. These 10 missions are set in 1988 and replicate the unit's typical operations from Tonopah Test Range Airfield, Nevada. You will take flight in a MiG-21 to expose pilots from operational units to Soviet aircraft, and to replicate adversary tactics during realistic combat training scenarios.

name: Farmine Land
description: Dive into Farmine Land, a captivating 2D retro-style MMORPG where mining, crafting, and battling monsters come to life! Own lands as NFTs, earn Landcoin, and explore a world full of challenges and rewards.

name: Kirei Zukin Seikatsu 2
description: A kids' Nintendo DS game that stars San-X characters. A tidying raccoon cleans and finds instruments for an orchestra's performance using touchscreen minigames.

name: Minecraft Classic
description: Minecraft Classic is a JavaScript remake of Classic 0.0.23a_01, made to celebrate 10 years of Minecraft and was uploaded to the Minecraft website. This version can be played at classic.minecraft.net for free.

name: Magical DoReMi: Puzzle Carnival
description: Experience the officially licensed Japanese IP Magical DoReMi match-3 mobile game! Customize your character with hairstyles, outfits, and accessories, freely explore the village, and solve puzzles by clearing crystals and obstacles on the game board. Earn coins and items as you progress. Enjoy stress-free gameplay while giving your brain a fun workout. Dive into the magical charm of Magical DoReMi today!

name: A Better World
description: A Better World tells the story of two women on the run from the Institute: Jo and Liz, and their mission to create a better, safer world. After three years of relative safety, their past has caught up with them: they find themselves hunted by retention synths and a rogue, ruthless courser, with everything they’ve worked to build at stake. To support this story, A Better World features a dual setting split between the vast wilderness of Abbot County and the derelict ruins of an underground pre-war shopping center called Vault-Tec Plaza.

name: Twilight School: The Forbidden Experiment
description:
Three mysterious substitute teachers -Keith, Hayden and Colin- arrive at your academy. But there's more to them than meets the eye-they're all vampires! One day, you uncover their biggest secret yet: the academy is secretly cultivating a rare ingredient essential for a potion Keith is creating that turns vampires into humans.

Caught between these revelations and your growing connection to the vampires, what path will you choose?

name: B-Daman
description:
Immerse yourself in the dynamic and thrilling universe of B-Daman Crossfire, your destination for intense marble-blasting combat. This game places you in the midst of the action where skill in maneuvering and strategy will determine your success on the journey to becoming the ultimate champion.

In the world of marble shooters, you are introduced to an expansive selection of 12 distinct figures, each with unique capabilities. The game offers an exceptional degree of personalization, allowing you to customize your figure down to the finest detail. Choose from an impressive array of over 40 different parts, accessories, and colors to enhance its performance and create a hero that truly reflects your personal style.

name: Come on,Fantasy baby!
description: Watch out for a heart-throbbing adventure! Let us take you into an ideal world for men, where you can control and save various Korean beauties from different dimensions, each with their own unique style. Every day unfolds an irresistible and exhilarating fantasy life.

name: Boku to Iu Mono
description: The protagonist character has 'lived' alone and unfeeling as a conscience inhabiting random objects and animals for random times for as long as he can remember — but one day, he turns into the shape of a human boy. His life changes utterly when the human girl Sae decides to try to befriend him, naming him "Ao" for his deep blue eyes as he cannot speak. Every day, they have fun playing hide and seek — but one day, Sae stops coming...

name: Eldrum: Black Dust
description: Dive into a dark, immersive world where your choices shape your destiny. Eldrum: Black Dust is a gripping text-based RPG that combines the depth of D&D, the strategic gameplay of CRPGs, and the narrative freedom of CYOA gamebooks.

name: My Lovely Cat: Remastered
description: Get ready for a purrfectly sweet romance set in a cat café!

name: Boxing Star: Match 3
description: Match colorful gems to unleash powerful punches and combos. The more puzzles you solve, the stronger your punches will be!

name: Takedown Legends
description:
Epic Fast-Paced Battles
Dive into an intense battle royale set in a magical arena! Experience thrilling multiplayer gameplay tailored for mobile. Unlock exclusive collectibles and engage in fast-paced battles to dominate the arena!

name: Force Of Guardians
description: Force of Guardians is an online action game that combines elements of a MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) with pixel art graphics. In this game, players participate in 3-on-3 battles that are designed to be short and engaging, typically lasting around five to six minutes
